attributes.action: Cancel current academic year and repeat it in September.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this as it will be very beneficial for all other children as they are our future and at the moment the future is not looking too good for them. They need as much help as possible.
attributes.background: Repeat this academic year for all children due to the pandemic, they are all falling behind and not taking nothing in. My son is in year 3 and I worry to think how he will cope going into year 4 not knowing much.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
